tool_description: High performance HTTP API that responds with the requested HTTP status code.
name: HTTP Status Codes
title: HTTP Status Codes

api_list.name: status code
api_list.description: Responds with the requested status Code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://http-status-codes.p.rapidapi.com/201"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "http-status-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://http-status-codes.p.rapidapi.com/{status_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "http-status-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
